title: Big Adventure at the Lake!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey Riko, would you like to go play at the lake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>The lake? Sounds good, letâ€™s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I have a fun attraction at that lake in mind~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>An attraction......? Ah, I know! Wakeboarding!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Nope, ziplining.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ziplining...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Weâ€™ll fly over the lake using a rope and pulley system!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>The longest zip line in the world is 2130 meters long. The one at the lake isnâ€™t that long, but flying over a lake is already a big adventure~ ğ… <:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hold on, Mari-chan! I just thought itâ€™d be nice to read at the lake...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thatâ€™s okay, too! Thereâ€™s a log cabin cafe by the lake. We can go there after ziplining! Come on, letâ€™s go~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hold on, Mari-chan! Mari-chaaan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
